law.catch_line: Filing of rates -- Rate standard -- Adherence.

text.section: Every title insurer shall, before use in this state, file with the commissioner its schedule of the risk portion of premium rates for title insurance, and thereafter every modification or amendment thereof.
Rates for title insurance shall not be excessive, inadequate, or unfairly discriminatory.
The insurer shall adhere to the rates as so filed by it.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1320, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 22, sec. 2, effective June 18, 1970.
